name: promptly
description: Una interfaz de chat moderna que se conecta a Ollama local y APIs externas de IA

scripts.build: npm run validate && echo '✅ Build completed - no compilation needed for vanilla JS'
scripts.validate: npm run validate:structure && npm run validate:syntax && npm run validate:html
scripts.validate:structure: echo '🔍 Validating project structure...' && test -f index.html && test -f css/styles.css && test -d js && echo '✅ Structure OK'
scripts.validate:syntax: echo '🔍 Validating JavaScript syntax...' && node -c js/config.js && node -c js/providers.js && node -c js/chat.js && node -c js/app.js && echo '✅ Syntax OK'
scripts.validate:html: echo '🔍 Validating HTML...' && grep -q 'chatMessages' index.html && grep -q 'messageInput' index.html && echo '✅ HTML OK'
scripts.deploy: echo '🚀 Deploy automatically via GitHub Actions on push to main'
scripts.info: echo '📋 Promptly v1.0.0 - Modern AI Chat Interface' && echo '🏠 Local: http://localhost:8000' && echo '🌐 Demo: https://yamicueto.github.io/promptly'

author: YamiCueto
